label: 榮朝
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: 1. 1014-1095; monk in Nara  2. D. 1247; Shakuembō monk at Chōrakuji at Serada in Kōzuke Province, disciple of Eisai (pp. 87, 264, 339, 364).　［釈円房、長楽寺、世良田、上野、栄西］
